name: Toggler
Calculo Caudal
Insertar registro
Solcitud a script de Python via MQTT para obtener datos de sensores
Respuesta script Python via MQTT con dato de sensores
GetSOAP
PutSOAP
func:
msg.headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'text/xml;charset=UTF-8',
    'SOAPAction': 'http://www.mop.cl/controlextraccion/wsdl/datosExtraccion/authSendDataExtraccionOp'
};

msg.payload = 
`<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:aut="http://www.mop.cl/controlextraccion/xsd/datosExtraccion/AuthSendDataExtraccionRequest">
   <soapenv:Header>
      <aut:authSendDataExtraccionTraza>
         <aut:codigoDeLaObra>OB-1402-497</aut:codigoDeLaObra>
         <aut:timeStampOrigen>2024-09-02T14:01:00Z</aut:timeStampOrigen>
      </aut:authSendDataExtraccionTraza>
   </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <aut:authSendDataExtraccionRequest>
         <aut:authDataUsuario>
            <aut:idUsuario>
               <aut:rut>16338539-2</aut:rut>
            </aut:idUsuario>
            <aut:password>MkMKg69nO2</aut:password>
         </aut:authDataUsuario>
         <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
         <!--Optional:-->
         <aut:authDataExtraccionSuperficial>
            <aut:fechaMedicion>02-09-2024</aut:fechaMedicion>
            <aut:horaMedicion>14:01:00</aut:horaMedicion>
            <aut:caudal>10</aut:caudal>
            <aut:alturaLimnimetrica>1</aut:alturaLimnimetrica>
         </aut:authDataExtraccionSuperficial>
      </aut:authSendDataExtraccionRequest>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>`;

return msg;

name: ExtractResponse
Query Flujo L/min - Volumen m3
query:
WITH 
sensor1 AS (
    SELECT time,
    measurement 
    FROM sensor_log 
    WHERE sensor_id = 1 
    ORDER BY time DESC 
    LIMIT 1
),
sensor2 AS (
    SELECT measurement 
    FROM sensor_log 
    WHERE sensor_id = 2 
    ORDER BY time DESC 
    LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
	sensor1.time as timestamp,
	TO_CHAR(sensor1.time, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS date,
    TO_CHAR(sensor1.time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS time,
    sensor1.measurement AS "flujo_L_min", 
    sensor2.measurement AS volumen_m3
FROM sensor1, sensor2

info:
Cada x minutos enviar registro mas antiguo no enviado

Quedan registros por mandar?
Si: intenta enviar
No: no se intenta enviar

name: Query Registros Hora
query:
SELECT * FROM registros_hora
WHERE bucket < date_trunc('hour', now())
AND id_obra = 1
AND estado_dga <> 'enviado - ok'
ORDER BY bucket ASC;

name: PutSOAP
ExtractResponse
Update Registro
query:
UPDATE registros_hora
    SET estado_dga = '{{{ msg.payload.estado_dga }}}',
        comprobante_dga = '{{{ msg.payload.comprobante_dga }}}',
        fecha_actualizacion = NOW()
    WHERE bucket = '{{{ msg.id_composite.timestamp_no_ms }}}'
    AND id_obra = {{{ msg.id_composite.id_obra }}};
